response_requirements.initial_response_description: If agency has written procedures: Follow those procedures. If no written procedures: Provide access within 1 working day after written request.
response_requirements.no_response_consequence: Circuit court action for mandamus relief. Court may order production of wrongfully withheld records.

fee_structure.notes: Agencies may charge reasonable fees for copying, search time, and administrative overhead. Must follow agency's written procedures if adopted.

exemptions.description: Records specifically exempted by other statutes

appeal_process.appeal_description: Administrative appeal to agency head not specifically required. Circuit court action for mandamus relief available. Court may order production of wrongfully withheld records.
appeal_process.burden_of_proof: Government must justify withholding with specific exemption

requester_requirements.specific_format: Written request required. Be specific about records sought. Check if agency has published access procedures.
requester_requirements.notes: Any person has right to inspect, copy, or mechanically reproduce public records. Broad definition of public records.

specific_obligations: Public bodies encouraged to adopt reasonable written procedures
All denials must be in writing
Must cite statement of specific exemption relied upon
Must cite legal authority for denial
Follow adopted procedures for cost, time, place, and method of access

oversight_body.name: Mississippi Attorney General (guidance only)
oversight_body.role: Provides guidance on public records law. No formal enforcement authority.
enforcement_powers: Provide guidance on public records law
No formal enforcement authority - enforcement through courts
